title: Update sign-in welcome copy to “Welcome to EOA”

requirements.text: Update the unauthenticated sign-in / welcome screen UI so that it displays the exact heading text "Welcome to EOA" (with this casing) on pages that prompt the user to sign in, and ensure no extra/garbled characters appear in the welcome copy.

quotes: I want the welcome page where you well where you sign in to say welcome to eoa

acceptanceCriteria: When the user is signed out and lands on a page that renders the unauthenticated sign-in prompt, the screen shows the text "Welcome to EOA" clearly and exactly (no leading/trailing characters like "W").
The welcome text is user-facing English and is readable at common desktop and mobile widths.
No changes are made to authentication behavior (login/logout) other than updating the displayed welcome copy.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn UI components are read-only in this project).
Do not edit any files listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (e.g., frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx).
nonGoals: Do not rename the app brand (branding.appName) or change routing/navigation as part of this request.
Do not change the Profile setup dialog welcome text unless it is part of the sign-in welcome screen the user referred to.
